title: Ingaruka Rusange Zacu
subtitle: Reba uko umuryango wacu w’abazigama uri guhindura uburezi bw’abana hirya no hino ku isi
impactBasedOn: Dushingiye ku nkunga zose zingana na {{amount}}, dore igereranya ry’ingaruka twateje turi kumwe.
transparencyP1: Muri AidVault, twemera ko ufite uburenganzira bwo kumenya neza aho inkunga zawe zigiye. Buri faranga rikurikiranwa kuva muri vault yawe rikagera ku bana barifashwamo. Dukorana gusa n’abafatanyabikorwa bemewe mu burezi mu bihugu birenga 15 basangiye natwe indangagaciro zo kubazwa inshingano.
transparencyP2: Raporo zacu z’ingaruka zisohoka buri mezi atatu zisobanura uko buri faranga ryakoreshejwe, kandi abafatanyabikorwa bacu batanga gihamya yo ku rwego rw’ibanze y’uko ibikoresho n’amafaranga bigera ku bagenewe. Ibi si inkunga isanzwe—ni ingaruka zikurikiranwa kandi zigenzurwa.
joinSaversCount: Ifatanye n’abazigama {{count}} bari guhindura ubuzima bw’abana binyuze mu mbaraga zo gutanga hamwe.
